description:
Welcome to Snack Basue! Delight yourself in this charming snack bar, just five stations away from Hokkaido`s largest downtown area, Susukino. Run by the quirky proprietress, Basue, and her junior hostess, Akemi, the place is filled with laughter and smiles from its oddball regulars and walk-ins as they regale tales of their lives. So, pull up a seat and have a drink—is shochu OK?
Source: crunchyroll
Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on December 10, 2023 at Cine Libre Ikebukuro in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on January 13, 2024.

REGULAR.description:
In Hokkaido, a man wanders into a bar named Snack Basue. His first snack bar experience becomes a night to remember when he meets the two eccentric ladies who run the place. Along with other patrons, they willingly (or not) discuss what`s on their minds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Stay Together (Welcome to Basue) / I Ain`t Gonna Stand For It (Everyone Has Different Tastes) / God`s Gift to the World (Men Are...)
Let`s Stay Together (Youkoso Basue e) / I Ain`t Gonna Stand For It (Sukimi wa Sorezore) / God`s Gift to the World (Otokotte......)
Let`s Stay Together (ようこそバス江へ) / I Ain`t Gonna Stand For It (好みはそれぞれ) / God`s Gift To The World (男って......)

REGULAR.description:
The ladies at the snack bar planned on interviewing two new hires—a girl named Kosame and a robber?! With trouble at hand, will they be able to handle this one? With passionate talks of princes on white horses, etc., it`s another fun night at Snack Basue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come Rain or Come Shine (Kosame-chan Clocks In) / Sweet Baby (If It`s Sweet Love, Then...) / Still Waiting (I Dream of You)
Come Rain or Come Shine (Kosame-chan Hairimasu) / Sweet Baby (Amai Ai Nara...) / Still Waiting (Anata o Yumemiteru)
Come Rain or Come Shine (小雨ちゃんはいります) / Sweet Baby (甘い愛なら...) / Still Waiting (あなたを夢見てる)

REGULAR.description:
Two men walk into the snack bar, and what do they find? A murder scene?! Has Akemi had enough of her boss`s shenanigans?! Find out, with talks of the past and secret techniques to follow! Another lively night at Snack Basue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You`re Still My Brother (If It`s for You, My Cutie) / As the Years Go Passing By (Straight to My Heart) / Try Me (To the One I`ve Fallen For)
You`re Still My Brother (Kawaii-kun no Tame Nara) / As the Years Go Passing By (Gutto Kichau wa) / Try Me (Horeta Anta ni)
You`re Still My Brother (可愛い君のためなら) / As The Years Go Passing By (グッときちゃうわ) / Try Me (惚れたあんたに)

REGULAR.description:
Love is in the air as the men of the snack bar dare to ask the difficult question: What is Akemi`s type?! With the stresses of life eating away at the patrons` souls, it`s a good opportunity to find out if you see it too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There Is Love (Koi ni Ochitara) / If I Should Die Tonight (Kon`ya wa Mou Owari) / Soul Shadows (Sore wa Maboroshi Mitai ni)
There Is Love (When You Fall in Love) / If I Should Die Tonight (I`m Done for Tonight) / Soul Shadows (It Was Like an Illusion)
There Is Love (恋に落ちたら) / If I Should Die Tonight (今夜はもう終わり) / Soul Shadows (それは幻みたいに)

REGULAR.description:
Azuma is back to impress the ladies through palm reading written by none other than Love Guru Douglas Hamada?! The night goes on as Valentine`s day chocolate is given and smack talk is served, making it another lively night!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Get On The Good Foot (おみあし拝見) / Talkin` Loud And Saying Nothin` (悪口はダメよ) / My Funny Valentine (愛するあなたへ)
Get on the Good Foot (Omiashi Haiken) / Talkin` Loud and Saying Nothin` (Waruguchi wa Dame yo) / My Funny Valentine (Ai Suru Anata e)
Get on the Good Foot (Put Best Foot Forward) / Talkin` Loud and Saying Nothin` (Don`t Say Mean Things.) / My Funny Valentine (To My Dearest Love)

REGULAR.description:
Come on a journey as Snack Basue dives into the world of fantasy and games. New but recognizable customers join the gang as the night heats up in debate and apologies are given to publishing companies. Fishing and reunions also to come!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hello Stranger (Seeds of Salvation...) / What a Wonderful World (Welcome to the Lifestyle of the Wonderful Other World) / As (Let`s Meet at That Place.) / Mean Old World (It`s of the Past...)
Hello Stranger (Soshite Densetsu e......) / What a Wonderful World (Kono Subarashii Isekai Seikatsu ni Youkoso) / As (Ano Basho de Atsumarou) / Mean Old World (Mukashi no Hanashi yo...)
Hello Stranger (そして伝説へ......) / What A Wonderful World (この素晴らしい異世界生活にようこそ) / As (あの場所で集まろう) / Mean Old World (昔の話よ...)

REGULAR.description:
The night opens as Morita tries to string Yamada along as his virgin buddy, though Yamada claims he`s not. Will the salary man be able to prove it?! Come walk down memory lane as the patrons talk of their past struggles and enjoy a good glass or ten.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Closer (Don`t Leave Me Behind) / What a Fool Believes (Don`t Make Fun of Me) / God Blessed Our Love (None of Your Business)
Closer (Oite Ikanaide) / What a Fool Believes (Baka ni Shinaide) / God Blessed Our Love (Ookina Osewa yo)
Closer (置いていかないで) / What A Fool Believes (馬鹿にしないで) / God Blessed Our Love (おおきなお世話よ)

REGULAR.description:
Akemi has a new challenge on her hands as baddies crowd the bar. Will she have good advice for these evil commanders? Tonight, skills will be tested and regrets will be born as the hostess and junior hostess serve another odd crowd!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: None Of Us Are Free (ありのままの私を見て) / In The Midnight Hour (強敵に捧ぐ......!) / Twinkle Twinkle Little Me (時には童心に返って) / Angel (素直なあの娘)
None of Us Are Free (Ari no Mama no Watashi o Mite) / In the Midnight Hour (Kyouteki ni Sasagu......!) / Twinkle Twinkle Little Me (Toki ni wa Doushin ni Kaette) / Angel (Sunao na Ano Musume)
None of Us Are Free (See Me as I Am) / In the Midnight Hour (Dedicated to the Strong Enemies......!) / Twinkle Twinkle Little Me (Embrace Your Inner Child) / Angel (That Honest Girl)

REGULAR.description:
In today`s episode, the Hero returns with very normal stories about swords and strength. Will he be able to find the answer he needs? Join Basue and Akemi as they assist their patrons with self preservation and self discovery.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Release Yourself (Kangae Sugi yo) / Bad, Bad Whiskey (Yoenai Watashi) / Can`t Get Any Harder (Gaman Sasenaide)
Release Yourself (You`re Thinking Too Much) / Bad, Bad Whiskey (The Me Who Can`t Get Drunk) / Can`t Get Any Harder (Don`t Make Me Wait)
Release Yourself (考えすぎよ) / Bad, Bad Whiskey (酔えないわたし) / Can`t Get Any Harder (ガマンさせないで)

REGULAR.description:
To make a friend or not to make a friend, that is the question this week at our lovely run-down snack bar. Find out whose point is superior and meet the new customers who drop in this time! Grab a drink and listen in on tonight`s shenanigans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friend To Friend (私と友達になって♥) / Wednesday Night (こんな夜はどう?) / Only Sixteen (若いっていいなぁ)
Friend to Friend (Please Be My Friend?) / Wednesday Night (How About a Night Like This?) / Only Sixteen (It Must Be Nice Being Young)
Friend to Friend (Watashi to Tomodachi ni Natte) / Wednesday Night (Konna Yoru wa Dou?) / Only Sixteen (Wakaitte Ii naa)

REGULAR.description:
Heated debates stir up the snack bar this week as Akemi goes head-to-head with her patrons. Who will you side with, and are the topics worth debating? Grab a drink and come decide for yourself at Snack Basue!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Under The Cherry Moon (あなたが愛してくれるなら) / Adult Education (おとなの事情) / Solitude (僕は友達が少ない)

Under the Cherry Moon (As Long as You Love Me) / Adult Education (An Adult`s Reason) / Solitude (I Don`t Have a Lot of Friends)

REGULAR.description:
Welcome home, dear viewer, as you`re greeted by a new face tonight. Meet Misawa, Akemi`s friend! How will she react when she meets Morita for the first time? Find out in tonight`s episode of lies and manhood.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Pretende (なりたい私に) / Let Me Into Your World (理解するのは難しい) / Trouble Man (あんた何なのよ)
The Great Pretender (I`ll Become Who I Want to Be) / Let Me into Your World (It`s Hard to Understand) / Trouble Man (Who Do You Think You Are?)
The Great Pretender (Naritai Watashi ni) / Let Me into Your World (Rikai Suru no wa Muzukashii) / Trouble Man (Anta Nani na no yo)

REGULAR.description:
In this final week, join the patrons one last time as Akemi reaches new heights of ridiculousness involving inappropriate words. So pick up a glass and enjoy the run-down snack bar as you de-stress, engage, and sing along!
Source: crunchyroll
